name: brazenly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in an obvious way, with no effort to hide something: The robber brazenly carried the stolen painting to the getaway car. I don't know how you can lie to me so brazenly.
More examplesFewer examplesIt is sometimes considered a positive quality to speak your mind brazenly and not to care about causing offense.She brazenly defied the order not to see him and met him often.Illegally copied movies are often sold brazenly in towns and cities.
